1.content: Who shall start to plump up?
1.title: Who to fatten?

choices: Plotting with him to stuff Peach silly, but secretly!
Trying to get her a food addict shroom
Plotting with Todsworth to get a weight gain gun from E. Gadd
11.content:
It was a sunny day in the Mushroom Kingdom, and Mario and Peach had just gotten done seeing a spy movie starring Toadsworth back when he was young "Thames Gonde, 021" and they were about to go out to dinner when Bowser appeared from the sky in his clown car.

"Wow, does he ever give up?" Peach asked, exasperated.

"No idea, but I'm not in the mood for this!" Mario said in an annoyed voice, which Bowser ignored.

"BWAR HAWR HAR! Mario give Peach up now and I'll-GWAHHH!!!!" Bowser yelled in pain, his rant was interupted by Mario knocking him away with his hammer. After that the mood was ruined and Peach and Mario decided to go home to the castle. After Peach went to her room, Toadsworth came to see Mario, who was in a foul mood.

"Master Mario, what ever is the matter?"

"It's Bowser, he interupted our date after your movie and ruined the mood."

"If only Madam Peach was less attractive to Bowser, eh? As a matter of fact I hear he dislikes large women." Toadsworth insinuated

"Really?" Mario said before...
11.title: Princess Peach gets big!

choices: A random Toad who didn't hear a thing
Princess Peach, she managed to catch snippets of their conversation
111.content:
"Then why don't-a we help protect-a the princess in that way?" the red plumber said. The mushroom man looked at Mario in horror, as if he couldn't believe that Mario was even suggesting that.

"But... Master Mario! What about the Princess? She'll be severely unhealthy if she reaches the weight that Bowser hates! What happens if she..." Toadsworth stuttered before Mario clamped his hand over her mouth.

"Toadsworth... the food in the mushroom kingdom is different to the food Luigi and I used to eat. I've ask Professor Egad and he says the food will help anyone put on weight without to many ill effects like heart attack and obesity."

"Really?"

"Plumber's honour. Besides, the princess will look cuter if she gained a bit more weight"

"Then fine. But I know the princess loves her figure. How will we convince her to eat and prevent her from loosing all the fat she will accumilate?"

"Well, we'll first get her to throw one of those Mushroom Kingdom banquets, you know how much she loves those, and we'll put some crushed mushroom powder in her meal. This way she'll get hungrier much easier." Mario said thinking carefully

"Crushed Mushroom powder? Well we happen to have some in our medical supp lies so that some of the ill Toads here can gain appetite to keep themselves healthy."

"Exactally. So we put it in the food, do a few tricks to stop the princess from noticing and..."

"Soon the princess will be fat and safe!" the Mushroom man exclaimed, nearly throwing his stick up with joy.

Then, the doors flew open, Mario and Toadsworth turned to see it was...
111.title: Plotting with him to stuff Peach silly, but sec...

choices: Toadsworth accidentally put on too much!
1111.content:
Mario and Toadsworth sighed in relief as a random, green and black toad walked in doing his rounds.

The next week Mario and Toadsworth had managed to invite practically everybody (that was good) in the kingdom to the feast. Toad (the red one from the video games) had just served Peach and she was about to eat when Luigi interrupted her to show her his 'Amazing triple spin high jump 9000'! The princess was so absorbed in the technique that was able Toadsworth pour in the crushed mushroom powder. The plan was a total sucess, and Peach was about to eat, but...
1111.title: Plan initiation

choices: "It's just going to help her put on weight a lot faster."
"Oh no... she's going to have such an appetite she'll everything she can reach!"
11112.content:
A small toad slipped passed the old toad causing the whole bottle of mushroom powder, which was meant for at least eight toads, into the princess' meal. After the old toad shot a look at the perpertrator who knocked him, he looked at the bottle and was shocked to see the whole bottle's contents were in the meal. The concerned toad was about to say something but the princess looked at him.

"Is there something wrong Toadsworth?" asked Princess Peach in concern. The moustached toad was about to say something but he dropped it. It was for the princess' own good.

"Nothing your highness, just that you look very beautiful today." he said. The princess beamed at his complement and kissed her caretaker on the head and began eatting her mushroom enhanced meal.

Her tastebuds exploded as she tasted the deliciousness of the professional toad's cooking and the mushroom powder. At first, she tried not to scarf down her meal but Toadsworth noticed that she was scarfing stuffed down her meal faster than usual, and was eagerly wanting more.

"It's tastier than usual!" she giggled, licking the few crumbs off her lips.

"Dessert, princess?" asked Toadsworth. The princess thought about it but shook her head which worried the old toad slightly. Usually the powder kicked in straight away.

"I think... I need to get seconds... you know... just to show the people that I don't hate these banquets." said the princess trying to disguise the starving feeling she was getting. The old toad nodded but pushed the princess gently down as she tried to stand up.

"Please princess, go have a good time, I'll get you seconds."

"Thanks... thanks so much." she said as the caned toad took her plate and walked over to the buffet table. He began piling the princess' plate with the most tasty and fattening things he could find before he felt a tap on his shoulder.

"So the plan is working?" asked a voice. The man turned around to see Mario grinning and getting his first serve of food after being mauled by fans. The old toad nodded. "What's up Toadsworth?"

"It's the princess! I accidently was jolted and spilled all the Mushroom powder into her food!"

Mario then said...
11112.title: Toadsworth accidentally put on too much!

111121.content:
"Look, nothing will go wrong... in fact. This might be a good thing." said Mario as he bit into a chicken wing. The old toad stared at him and Mario sighed. "Look, her weight gain won't happen immediately, only tomorrow but she will put on every calorie from tonight's binge and just gain weight so much more faster then we intended. But it'll be okay. The sooner she's rounder, the sooner we get Bowser out of the list of worries." Toadsworth knew the plumber was right so he nodded and looked at the princess who awaited her food. </p><p>
"I trust you Master Mario, now let's join the festivities" the old toad cheered merrily as he took the princess' piled plate back to her. The woman was in a deep conversation with some other woman, but upon seeing the food from her advisor, she stopped and thanked him began digging into the delicious, fattening courses, just a little bit faster then usual.
111121.title: Fast weight tomorrow

choices: Mario. He had breakfast in bed for her
Toadsworth. He didn't expect Peach to be THAT big
1111212.content:
As the sun rose over the Mushroom Kingdom Castle, Princess Peach's azure eyes fluttered open as she looked up from under her sheets. Last night was fantastic, she may have eaten more then she would have cared to admit, but the food was great and the people there were lovely. Feeling slow and sluggish the princess forced herself out of bed and gasped in surprise as her large pink bed made an unusually loud creak.

"I guess I must have eaten a bit too much ice cream." Peach said, her mouth threatening to water at the memory of the triple chocolate ice cream that Toadsworth continuously served her. The woman made her way towards her bathroom to have her usual morning shower. However, when she saw her form in front of the computer, her jaw dropped in amazement.

The largest part of her was her royal rear end copping most of the damage from last night's binge and the enormous amounts of mushroom powder she had consumed. Her bum inflated to a massive size, flab from her excess confectionary and dairy intake showing on her fleshy cheeks making her underwear look like a g-string. Her butt was so big that it came halfway down her thighs and didn't even fit into the range of the mirror. Her hips widened as well, Peach not able to see ends of it in the mirror. She gave her ass a small slap and for a full twenty seconds, her body jiggled, making her moan in a mix of pleasure and disgust.

"Please tell me this is a bad dream." Peach squeaked as she kept examining her new body.

Her thighs were so much softer and larger, to the point where they were squished to each other without the blonde putting her legs together. Peach tried doing the splits she was so proud of doing through the Olympic games but found that she couldn't with out causing a serious strain to her muscles, already weak and unaccustomed to her new fat.

Princess Peach's waist wasn't plump, it was enormous. Peach didn't realise that during the night her new love handles and her gigantic excercise ball- sized belly had ripped her night gown up so much that it looked like she was an escaped prisoner. Peach grabbed her sides and placed her fat sausage fingers through the various folds and gave them a hard shake up and down, to feel if they were real. It did hurt and her belly did vibrate. Finally, her tired legs gave in and Peach fell to her cushioning butt. She gave a cry of surprise as she rolled, near naked on the floor.

The princess sat their for a while to regain her energy before she forced herself up onto her knees by using her fat, lard filled arms. Her arms looked like her legs and they made her sleeves pop. They were weak as well, but not weak enough to not give Peach the leverage to try look down at herself. However, she couldn't see much as she couldn't see her thighs for herself, just a bit of her belly and her breasts that must have grown at least three cup sizes. Unable to keep her position, the woman fell over and had her face planted right in front of the skinny mirror, givng her a close up of her face. Her face was fattened up to the point where a new double chin was present. Peach frowned and exhaustedly lifted a heavy arm to stroke it, showing that she could feel a third chin. Her cheeks had puffed up like clouds making her look like a flabby chimpmunk. Now that she was fully awake, Peach found that a bit of her vision was restricted by her face fat.

"What happened to me?" Peach cried as she sat there in front of the mirror, forced to stare at her massive figure "How... when..."

A knock on the door was heard. Peach tried to yell out to tell them to not come in but it was to late. Someone was walking in. It was...
1111212.title: Tomorrow... the weight gain!

choices: Luigi  and Daisy enter with seconds and a surprise
11112121.content:
"Peach, are you in?," The young plumber opened the door, carrying a tray full of super fattening food. With no sign of the princess in sight, Mario looked around the room. he was almost ready to give up until his blue eyes rested upon an immensely fat blonde girl contently admiring herself in the mirror.

"Mamma mia," he cried out as he almost fainted, the princess, he estimated, must have weighed over 800 pounds. her ass was now the size of two large beach balls and nearly four feet wide. her thighs were eight feet in circumference, the massive belly between them was a total of twelve feet around. Resting on top of it were breasts the size of twin globes. She turned around as much as her girth would allow, a smile on her triple chinned face. ooh breakfast, she said kissing her dazed boyfriend on the cheek before digging in.

she had just finished the meal when...
11112121.title: Mario. He had breakfast in bed for her

choices: Luigi, with fast food for Daisy...
Waluigi, who had a trick up his sleeve...
Princess Peach, who wanted to invite Daisy to dinner...
12.content:
Princess Daisy was waiting for her boyfriend, Luigi, to visit her castle in Sarasaland. The doorbell rang, and Daisy said, "Come in!"

Who was at the door?
12.title: Hi, I'm Fat Daisy!

123.content:
It was Princess Peach, who graced her friend with her royal presence. She said, "Hi, Daisy. How are you?"

Daisy put a hand on her growling stomach, and she said, "Not so good, Peach... My stomach is killing me!"

Peach just giggled and said, "Well, I've invited you to my Royal Banquet tonight. Care to come?"

Daisy, who couldn't stand the hunger pains any longer, said, "YES! ANYTHING TO EASE THE PAIN!"

Later, Daisy...
123.title: Royal Dinner Invite

1232.content:
By the time the Royal Banquet was just starting, Peach, Daisy, and all the other guests were seated. Daisy waited for the chefs to bring the appetizers, and they did. As the appetizers arrived, Daisy's eyes lit up as Peach handed a large plateful of finger sandwiches. Daisy began digging in like a wild animal, and Peach was shocked by Daisy's behavior as she said, "Daisy, where are your manners?!"

Daisy put down the plate and said, "Sorry, Peach. I'll save some for everyone else."

Daisy didn't know it yet, but her savage gluttony gave her a bit of a jiggly potbelly, as the guests took their eyes off Daisy and resumed eating. Soon, Daisy was offered a bowl of soup, which she ate normally as the other guests did.

What happens next?
1232.title: Daisy Made It!

125.content: It was an invitation. Or rather, a challenge from someone anonymous. Daisy was very competitive and decided to accept. What was the challenge?
125.title: No one in particular...?

choices: 25lbs and had no intention of stopping
75lbs and had no intention of stopping
13.content:
"I can't believe they kicked me out!" sobbed Rosalina as she flopped on her bed and cried in her queen sized room onboard the Comet Observatory. The lumas floated around her with a box of tissues and what their "mamma" called comfort food which were a variety of delicacies imported from the Mushroom Kingdom. The small stars were used to Mamma crying these days though they were never happy about it.

Rosalina loved riding her bike and her go kart but she was easily offended about her weight. At the Mario Kart Grand Prix, she recieved various amounts of insults from people for being the only heavyweight female and for that reason, the food loving woman began dieting and excerising more until she was roughly was about Princess Peach's weight.

Unfortunately, the organisers didn't like how Rosalina had slimmed down as they had too many middle weight racers so they had let Rosalina go from the one sport she loved.

The blue dressed woman sobbed as the lumas fed her various foods in attempt to make their care taker feel better. Not caring what they put in her mouth, from chocolate to candy, from cake to lollipops and starbits, Rosalina ate them all.

One paticular black luma was concerned for Rosalina's unhealthy diet. Everyday, Rosalina would wake up, look in her wardrobe at her old biker outfit, attended to the lumas from the comfort of her bed in her pajamas before crying her eyes out and generally not moving at all each day. The caring lumas would then feed her eight meals a day in a small attempt to make "Mamma" stop crying and get her back to normal and cheery again

As she excercised less and gained more, by the end of the first week, Rosalina had easily gained...
13.title: Rosalina

choices: Where the lumas were... she thought the ripping was nothing
the mirror and gasps at her recent weight gain (In awe or disgust, your choice)
132.content:
In one week, Rosalina had miraculously managed not only to regain the weight she had lost, but an additional 75lb much to Polari's amazement and displeasure. The cosmo princess began to expand, her royal rear end copping most of the damage. Rosalina's bum inflated to a massive size, flab from her excess confectionary and dairy intake showing on her fleshy cheeks. Her hips widened, her thighs grew softer to where they were beginning to near touching each other without the blonde putting her legs together. Princess Rosalina's waist began to get plump, developing love handles and a little pot belly.

Her arms looked like her legs and they made her dress sleeves come right up and her breasts grew at least a cup larger. He face was fattened up to the point where a new double chin was coming and her cheecks had puffed up like clouds. Rosalina was a big girl before but now she was fat. She had remained unaware due to her determination not to look in the mirror at her "skinny form", even though her baggy night gown was beginning to tear at various seams.

But like the lumas had planned, Rosalina's attitude was improving. Despite herself getting tired from minimal forms of excerise, the luma's mamma was now smiling and getting out a bit more without bothering to change from her various blue nighties. Story time was now even more fun as all the lumas could sit on their new mamma's form without her getting crushed and she was generally more cheery.

The only luma concerned for Rosalina's health was the black luma Polari.

As she waddled up to her bedroom, stopping for several breaks along the way to catch her breath, after a paticularly large breakfast. Polari assembled all the lumas of the Comet Observatory and began to scold them for fattening up Rosalina and began rambling on the importance of her health and fitness.

But the lumas didn't listen as they were only concerned about their mamma's happiness and as long as she was happy, everything would be alright to them.

Meanwhile, Rosalina rummaged through her drawers and pulled out her blue biker's outfit. The smaller version that she was too wear when she had lost weight. Still feeling full and cheery from breakfast, the woman of the stars decided to try it on for old times sake. After a tenacious struggle, she got her nighty off. Standing in her white underwear, Rosalina's plump derriere tested the limits of her panties. They were swallowed in the mass depth of her bum crack, with most of each round cheek left exposed. It looked like a thong. She stepped into her blue biker's outfit and tried to tug it up over her thighs to no avail.

"Silly lumas... putting my outfits in the drier." sighed Rosalina as she kicked the tight body suit off and tried to put on her standard blue dress. Her butt was so round, it took some effort to pack it into the dress. It hugged the rounded dimensions of each bum cheek, and stuck to her softened waistline like a second skin. With the royal dress not offering the same support as her nighty did, Rosalina's fat bum cheeks were free to wobble and bounce with every movement. Her tummy jiggled too as it buldged foreward forcing the dress to ride up from it's low length. Her breasts also allowed this rise of the dress too and as a result the previously long dress now failed to cover her thighs and came up to a skirt's length, and even still you could see her bottom poking out below. Her flabby arms felt the tightness of the pressing sleeves and the princess' fat neck cut into her collar forcing her to rip it. At the sound of the ripping neck, Rosalina looked up suddenly and her well-rounded rump twitched and rolled as she began walking to...
132.title: Bike outfits are too small and so are dresses!

choices: She decided to change and see if the luma's were fine with her size
She got hungry and decided to eat first
She accidentally caused the observatory to crash?!
1322.content: As Rosalina reached the mirror she couldn't believe her eyes. The sight of her massive body almost gave her a heart attack. Making sure it was real, the star lady moved her arms up and down, and poked her stomach fat. At first Rosalina was scared, but then she saw that she was more than large enough to be in the large racer category. Soon Rosalina was jumping in joy, causing small tremors throughout the observatory. Rosalina was about to go sign up to race again when...
1322.title: the mirror and gasps at her recent weight gain ...

choices: She trips over her fat filled thighs!
She makes it down to the kitchen unharmed
13222.content: Her stomach grumbled. Rosalina was very suprised but she didn't question it. The blue dressed woman had starved herself by simply walking up the stairs and trying to put her clothes on. She wasn't too worried about her weight, she wasn't the biggest racer there (What she didn't know that she was the widest) so she thought there was no need to wory. Knowing her lumas would have said something if they disliked her appearance, the blonde took a sluggish step outside and began the long way down the stairs.
13222.title: To the kitchen!

choices: Fridge Time! Ice cream and stuff!
132222.content: Her journey was slow but eventually, Rosalina made it to the kitchen. Her hips scraped the sides of the door when she finally crawled up the steps and she smiled as she saw the empty kitchen. Her tummy grumbled again as she waddled and looked for something to eat.
132222.title: She makes it down to the kitchen unharmed

choices: ICE CREAM! I SEE ICE CREAM!
Oh no! The Lumas see her even fatterness!
1322221.content:
Rosalina smacked her lips and opened the fridge. She was delighted to find that her lumas had stocked up on food for her when she had gone into her angsty little mood a few weeks ago and there was plenty of things to eat. First she had a little bit of the chocolate cake that was oozing with fattening goodness and before she knew it, it was gone into her mouth. All of it.

The star princess burped, loudly. Her stomach was already big, round and bloated but now it sloashed when she tried to move the tiniest bit. But as her tummy grumbled, she realized she was still hungry. Starving in fact. Sitting her fat exposed ass in front of the fridge Rosalina made a grab for one doughnut. Or at least she thought it was a doughnut because by the time she realsied it, she had eaten a whole box of the jam filled pastries.

Once again, she burped in satisfaction. Looking further in the fridge, she saw it was covered in mouthwatering cakes. As she drooled, she scooted closer, soshe was able to reach the cakes and then proceeded to stuffing them down her throat, completely whole. Her belly grew, her dress became tighter. She felt like she should stop but she couldn’t. Everything tasted so good!

“More---gotta—“ She gulped. “Eat---more.” Rosalina then spied an open box of doughnuts. The box was at least as wide as three hot tubs and it was filled with delicious doughnuts. Rosalina was still on the cakes, so she ignored it for now. Her dress ripping at the seams. Rosalina knew that she should stop but all those days of eating nothing but what the lumas had given her had increased her stomach capacity tenfold.

“Chocolate---vanilla—carrot—strawberry shortcake!” She managed between bites. “All---so—good!”

With the last piece of cake, her dress was slowly coming apart, especially to her hefty chest and but area... She was about to go to sleep when she saw the doughnuts. A grin appeared on her face as she grabbed the doughnuts, tore up the box and began to devour them. Grabbing all she could, she stuffed at least ten into her mouth and managed to swallow them.

Rosalina continued to gorge, now in nothing but her bra and pants that were getting together and tighter. Her mind said to stop but her body told her to keep on going. Everything was so good! She wanted more! Just one more doughnut became two more and then it spiraled out of control. The doughnuts would soon disappear but that didn’t matter for...
1322221.title: Fridge Time! Ice cream and stuff!

choices: tries to kidnap the princess herself
her brothers play a prank on her
14.content: Okay and how is Wendy going to fatten up?
14.title: Wendy O. Koopa

141.content:
STOMP, STOMP, STOMP!

In one of the Kingdoms Bowser gave to his kids, Wendy was in the throne room pacing around her seat. This was probably the most effort she had put in as recently, she has started to become greedy with her power over her subjects and started to sit on her throne more often.

As such, she was starting to develop a bit of a pot-belly.

"What should I do today? Should I eat first or should I laze around for a bit?"
141.title: being lazy and greedy

choices: She just walks in and steals the Princess just like how Bowser useally does
She sneeks into the castle in disgise
142.content:
“SERVENTS! BRING ME MORE JEWELS!” Wendy’s scream echoed through the hallways of Bowser’s castle. The Koopa princess tapped her foot impatiently, her temper steadily growing shorter by the second.

“I SAID, I WANT MORE JEWELS!”

After awhile, the door to her room opened and one lone Koopa trooper entered, struggling to carry a
large bag of precious gems and jewels.

“That’s it?!?” Wendy yelled at the Koopa, looking at the single bag of jewels.

“S-sorry your highness,” the Koopa stuttered, “the others are too busy helping King Bowser with his latest plan to kidnap Princess Peach and young master Bowser JR has the rest looking for a place called candy island, so I was the only one available to obey you call.”

Windy growled. She was fed up with all the lack of attention she was getting. She was the only daughter of the Bowser, King of the Koopas, servants use to obey her every whim, and subjects from her father’s king down would present waves after waves of gifts and presents. But now, hardy anyone paid her any attention, even the offering of gifts had been steadily declining. She needed to do something to get everyone pay attention to her again.

“I know. I’ll kidnap the Princess myself! Then everyone will pay attention to me gain, and I have the perfect plan.”
142.title: tries to kidnap the princess herself

choices: a food Critic (putting on the pounds being asked to sample everyone’s cooking)
A famous opera singer (it’s not over till the fat lady sings)
1422.content:
“I’ll send the Princess a fake later telling her that a very special guest will be visiting her castle. It’s perfect, I’ll get the Princess’ own castle staff wait on me hand and foot, then I’ll grab that dim blonde and walk right out of the castle, with those foolish Toads smiling and saying goodbye.” Wendy giggled with Glee at this, “those fools will properly even open the door for me as I leave with the princess.”

Wendy then began to get to work on her plan. Sitting at her desk, she quickly grabbed a pen and began to write a quick note.

“Here!” she said, handing the letter to the Koopa she had summoned earlier, “Go to the Mushroom Kingdom and delivery to Peach.”

Nodding, the Koopa hurried out of the room.


“So an important visitor is coming to the castle, Princess?” Toadsworth asked, Peach having received a letter not too long ago.

“That’s right,” Peach said, rereading the later, “It says that the guest will arrive in the next few day, so please get a room prepared. In a few days time, we’ll be host to a ….”
1422.title: She sneeks into the castle in disgise

choices: "You must introduce me to the princess!"
"Let's get down to business. I'm starving!"
14221.content:
...food critic, Gwen A. Pook of the Gourmet Kingdom, for a goodwill meeting."

"Well, I better round up the best chefs in the kingdom," Toadsworth headed outside, "We better not disappoint this critic."

"Gwen A. Pook," Peach muttered to herself once he left, "Something odd about that."

Back in Bowser's Castle, Wendy was in no rush to rehearse for her role. She sneaked into the kitchen where she ordered one of the Koopa chefs to begin cooking dishes to her liking. She only had a few days to show up at the Mushroom Kingdom under her new alias without making anybody suspicious. The chef brought in a three-course dinner consisting of Caesar salad, roast beef and chocolate cake but Wendy could not be satisfied.

"That's not enough," She ordered, "A food critic would need to order one of everything on the menu."

While the chef ran back to make more food, Wendy began with the salad, taking a couple of forkfuls to analyze the texture before garnishing the rest of it with dressing and finishing it off. She was halfway through with the roast beef when the chef came back, rolling a cart of freshly prepared meals.

"The service is friendly," She told the chef, "More to restaurants than just the food."

The chef saluted and went back to work while Wendy polished off the rest of her meal. Manners not being her specialty, she picked her teeth and belched loudly, knowing she could get away with it at home. She then rolled the cart over and looked at the other dishes the chef prepared just for her. She didn't know where to start, her mouth watering at each tasty meal...

Two hours later, Wendy had finished every last bite with a better understanding of her food critic role. She hopped from her chair and up into her bedroom where she drifted into a food-induced sleep. The next morning she woke up and crept out of bed but an unfamiliar sight stopped her. It was her reflection in one of the mirrors in her room but she couldn't help but notice it was different. Everything looked the same except for a noticeably fuller face, slightly wider hips and a protruding gut. Wendy was never self-conscious about her figure but a light bulb went off in her head when she put it into perspective.

"The more weight I put on, the less they'll recognize me," She thought, "It's a cinch!"

The days passed and the Mushroom Kingdom's chefs along with Wendy's personal chef prepared for hours without rest. While Peach supervised the dining area, the food-critic-to-be kept running up Bowser's food bill. The night before Gwen A. Pook was to appear at the Mushroom Kingdom, Wendy called for a Koopa servant to help with her disguise. The servant's jaw dropped upon seeing her puffed out cheeks and double chin, along with her massive stomach, hips and legs.

"Before you ask, it's part of the disguise," She folded her flabby arms across her chest.

"I thought so," The servant told her.

"I want you to search any plus-size store for an outfit similar to this," She showed him a sketch, "Get me the largest you can find."

The next morning at the Mushroom Kingdom, the grand hall was prepared for the food critic's arrival. Just outside, Wendy's servant parked the Koopa clown car and began to make a well-dressed critic out of the only female Koopaling. He helped button down Wendy's tight-fitting shirt and fastened her belt while she put on a beehive hairdo wig, a pink hat and one of Iggy's extra pairs of glasses.

"Wait here," Wendy instructed to the servant.

She waddled toward the kingdom's gates where the two guards at the entrance recognized the visitor and opened the gate at once. She continued to the castle entrance where Toadsworth stood underneath her looming shadow.

"Welcome to the Mushroom Kingdom, Mrs. Pook!" He greeted her.

Wendy acknowledged Toad and said...
14221.title: a food Critic (putting on the pounds being aske...

choices: ...she felt something strange in her gut.
144.content:
"You done with that, yet!"

"Almost, your highness!"

In a small lab, a young Koopa princess waits as her Magikoopa assistant puts the final incantations on a dull-looking staff. He gives it one last tap, and it became shiny and glowy.

"There you go, Miss Wendy! Your brand new wand!"

Wendy received her gift with glee. "Mmmm, yes! Finally, I have the power I need to crush the plumb-ahs!"

She strutted out into the hallway, eyeing her new weapon.

"Now, how to use it first...Ooh! I'll use it give myself some new pow-ahs!"

***

Out on the sunshined roof, Wendy read from an old spell book from the head Magikoopa, Kamek. She squints as she reads her chosen page.

"Ugh! This guy's writing is awful! I'm just barely making it out! Oh well. I got the spell I need." She threw the book

to the side and began twirling her wand above her head."Now let's turn myself into a mountain-moving Goliath!"

She began her chanting.
"Pebbles scattered around Petey's feet!
Stronger power than from Grubba meat!
From the stars above, may it be so,
That no force is greater when these muscles grow!"

She tapped herself on the head, and coloured sparkles shot out from the wand's end. Wendy smiled from the seemingly successful spellcast. She looked around, waiting for her granted wish. But soon her smile turned to an unsatisfied frown.

"Oh, a dud! That's what I get for taking an older version of one of Kamek's books! Who writes that stuff, anyway! 'Pebbles around Petey's feet'?"

She paused to think. "Or...maybe it was 'petals'."

It was at that moment, that...
144.title: Wendy's Wand and Wobbling of Words

choices: The next morning, there's still some weighing her down!
By next week, she's grown a bit curvy!
Or maybe there's somewhere else it could go...
1441.content:
Wendy felt the oddest sensation build in her gut, as if a faucet turned on and was slowly filling her middle. She put her hand on her sloshy belly and noticed it now felt soft and a bit saggy. Wendy tilted her head in confusion. "What is happening in there!"

But her confusion turned to worry. Just by looking at her hands, she knew where this liquid was coming from. Her bracelets hung off what looked like trigs, and her heals were worn by two undernourished saplings. All but her middle had become a dried pink, and fear had completely covered her gaunt face.

She let out a weak "Oh no! That really was the wrong spell! I need to fix this!" and ran toward the roof's one door.

***

One of the castle's dingy kitchens was occupied by Iggy Koopa, who was gathering various sandwich-related items from the fridge. As he reached for the lettuce, the door behind him had swung open. His fellow koopaling was looking very sickly.

A call for help escaped her shriveled lips.

"Uh...what was that, Wendy? I couldn't hear ya."

The frustrated girl ran to the fridge and pushed Ludwig way, his would-be lunch now floored. She jumped for the large jug of cider on the top rack and quickly chugged away. The jug was emptied, but her thirst remained. She then grabbed the pitcher of cream and finished that off. Then a bottle of soda. Then a whole case of canned drinks. Iggy looked on in surprise at Wendy's constant guzzling.

Finishing the last drink, she wiped any drops from her chin and gave a releived sigh. She closed the door, only for it to stop on something. A downward look revealed a large warm-coloured bag. All the liquid she downed had gathered around her lower half.

"OooooooOOH! That Kamek! Why can't he just write like a normal person!"

Iggy laughed. "Got a spell wrong, huh? Maybe you should have asked someone who knows what they're doing!"

"Oh, hush, Iggy!" Wendy shifted her body to slam the door. "I'll just get my assistant to fix th-"

Just then, both Wendy and Iggy were alerted to her lower half's violently bubbling.

"Oh, you pipe down, too!" Wendy shoved her arms in to stop the commotion, but it kept going. At that moment, something prodded her shell. Wendy looked back to see that, two globes had blown up from under her bloated middle. Her attempts to halt their further growth were also useless. The liquid in her was growing heavier and thicker.

The fearful Wendy hurried back out the kitchen. As she left the room, her wide behind needed pulling from the kitchen's grasp. Iggy remained behind to watch the folly.

Wendy knew this all needed reversing, but rushing down the enormous hallway was like a wade through a swamp. With every step, her middle rounded out and buried her legs more. The two mounds blossoming on top prompted a nervous smile from their owner. The bumps in the back were deepening with plumpness. The increase was rapid and slowdown was nowhere.

Within only a matter of moments, the event had reached its end. The walls scraped her sides and the ceiling was just out of her reach. Wendy was stuck in place, held down by the five enormous bubbles of fat that made up her body. As she wondered what to do about it, one of her dome-like cheeks felt a hard kick. She looked back to see Iggy cackling away.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Wow, Wendy, you really screwed this one up!"

Wendy fumed at Iggy. "Ooh! You! Just go get my assistant!"

"Alright! I'll help ya this time!" Iggy headed to get her assistant, and all the miffed Wendy could do to spend the time was think about her figure.

***

"Here it is, your highness!"

"Well, bring it up here!"

The magikoopa approached Wendy, holding a flask of green fluid. He vanished from the floor and reappeared on one of her breasts.

"Do you mind?!"

He quickly handed her the flask and jumped off the jiggling launchpad. Wendy spied the flask with .

"Well, this was fun and all...except it wasn't! Back to my pleasant old self!"

Wendy swallowed the green fluid without pause.

===================================

So from this point on, Wendy returns to her normal size...or does she? That small flask can't possibly remove all that fat, can it? Not even a bit left in her?

And would you really want that, anyway?

So...wanna keep going?
1441.title: The Roundening of Wendy Koopa

choices: She loses the wand! (another way, of course)
1442.content:
Before Wendy could pick the book up and check if she was right, she was alerted to a deep bubbling sound. She thought there was a cauldron somewhere nearby, but she realized it was coming from her middle. She looked at her stomach and tilted her head in confusion. With each few seconds, the sound got a bit less quiet.

"That's funny. It shouldn't be making this noise, should it?"

Just then, the bubbling stopped and her stomach became a bit rounder, causing her to raise an eyebrow. She placed both hands on her hips and tapped her heel, pondering about what had happened. Before an answer could be proposed,-BLUMP!-her pudge blew up a little more. She looked like she had swallowed a basketball, and the bubbling started up again. Now Wendy was really upset!

"Alright, you!" She held her wand sideways and pressed in her stomach-ball. "Get back to your normal size, right--NNNNNH...now!" Her wand sank in, unable to shrink the sloshy bump. She hugged tighter and tighter-

BLOOSH!-and her belly was smaller again! Not as small as she wanted and a bit soft, but smaller. She almost smirked, until she noticed that something else felt different. She looked behind her, and saw her behind looking like two small jiggling orange globes! Now Wendy was concerned! Some sort of fat had grown in her, and it wasn't leaving soon! And more may be on the way!

The bubbling started up again! But slower this time, at its deepest level yet! And her stomach slowly ballooned back to its basketball size! Wendy was worried about what would come next, so she held up her wand and twirled above her head.

"Petals scattered around-UHN!"

Her torso and backside grew rounder!

"-around Petey's feet! Stronger power than from Grubba meat! From the-MM!"

She blew up, looking like a pumpkin ready for a contest! Her chest had grown two noticeable round bumps, and her legs rounded out!

"From the stars above, may it be so..."

Her cheeks and arms joined in the swelling, and the bubbling becoming a constant deep gurgle!

And the floor was soon to give out from Wendy's weight!
1442.title: ...within her grew a bubbling sound.

choices: ...and what a dominating plan it was!
14421.content:
"-that no force is greater when these muscles grow!"

The wand hit Wendy's forehead, shooting out its colourful sparks. Wendy crashed through the roof, landing in the center of banquet hall below. Her seat was planted in an imprint she left between the room's three long tables. The koopaling winced. "D'ooh, that smarted!"

She lifted each bloated leg at a time so that she would stand. A struggle it was, as every other part of Wendy wished to remain grounded. She turned her soft neck and gave her chunky arms a look of worry. "Oh no! What am I to do! I thought I would get fit today, but now I'm just a-" Her eyes turned to her chest. She gave an admired look to the head-sized hills, and cupped each one with each hand. "Hello! Aren't you a pleasant surprise!"

Then a strange sensation filled her arms. A warm pulse passed through the veins of her arms. Her biceps were growing the hottest, and soon swelled to twice their previous widths. Wendy gave a wide-eyed grin, and triumphantly flexed the flabby pythons.

"HNNN-hnhnhnnn! Finally! This is more like what I wanted from the start!"

Immediately her legs also pulsed, and grew from short pillowy bags into tight watermelons. Wendy wished to see the value of this change. She made large sweeps with each step, giggling as she made a full anticlockwise turn and her fat sloshed when each foot landed. She had grown to such an extreme flab, but finding she could move it around with ease made any worry in her evaporate. Her attention was then given to her backside, was her limited reach. She marveled at how round and deep her posterior had grown. Her hands slapped the small amount they could touch.

Wendy found joy in her new form. The gain she gained was impressive, and her might was the one force that could move it! The enormous koopaling's giggling slowly grew into an enormous cackle! The bulk she once feared was now her greatest ally! At that moment, some guards peaked in from one of the large banquet doors, hollered at what they saw and shut the door.

This commotion alerted Wendy. She turned to the door and approached with unhindered confidence. She placed her leg on the door, and threw the door open with a hard kick. Within the hallway the guards cowered, holding their spears toward the poorly lit beast. All the while, she gently stroked her rounded stomach.

"Now that's no way to treat your king's one daw-tah, is it?"

The guards's fears turned to shock. "Princess Wendy? Uh, sorry, we didn't know it was you. I mean...we saw your bow, but-"

"Enough with y babbling. I have important things to announce. There will be a meeting for everyone in the castle to attend, and every everyone will attend. I'll be waiting in the courtyard."

"Y-yes, madam!"

The guards ran off to give the announcement. Wendy walked down the hallway, her sides grazing the walls and her attention downward. She patted her belly, as if a brilliant plan had formed around it...
14421.title: She finishes the chant!

choices: Wendy, Kamek and the Koopalings held up their magic wands at the ready!
Wendy, Kamek and the many magikoopas held up their magic wands at the ready!
144211.content:
The castle courtyard met its highest attendee count yet. All servants and armsmen had gathered on the grass and on the walls, for the new announcement. Many wondered what it was. Some were happy to just have a small break from work. Bowser, Junior and the Koopalings were in the crowd, and were the most confused about this. They all surrounded the spot for the announcement of news, but whoever was bringing it was nowhere in sight.

The mutters were broken as the courtyard's large backdoor creaked open. Everyone looked into the space behind the door, and saw a large orange blob with bulging limbs emerge from the darkness. It held a staff only worthy of the higher-ups. They say a pink bow adorn the top, so they soon realized who it was. The audience was filled with emotions...shock, awe, surprise, fear, fainting spells, and one Troopa's face matching his red shell.

The blob's family were the most surprised. "Wendy, what happened to you!"

"It looks a MegaMushroom didn't agree with ya!"

Wendy waddled toward the large royal emblem in the center of the enclosure. She looked to the crowd with confidence.

"Greetings, Koopa Kingdom! As you see before you, I have gained a considerable heaviness, and have become the heaviest in the castle! And with it, I've received the muscle needed to transport it where ever I wish! This is because I cast two wonderful spells upon myself!

"And as you know, the Mushroom Kingdom has been our greatest enemy for the longest time! We've made countless attempts to overtake them, and all have been thwarted! My insides growl with anger and hatred, amongst other things!

"And I have a plan that will very well bring us victory! The spells I cast on myself were great, but with more casters, I could become the greatest threat the Mushroom Kingdom has ev-ah known! With yours truly at a greater size, we would storm toward their land, and announce their surrender! And if they refuse...I will flatten their kingdom!"

The underlings looked at each other with questioning looks, but they slowly showed approval for the plan. Soon, they were all for it, including the other royals. They all clapped and cheered for Wendy, bringing her joyful pride to its peak.

****
Everyone had gathered at the outskirts of their kingdom, keeping their distance from their commander. She faced the direction of the Mushroom Kingdom in the distance. Kamek read over his given sheet with a look of confusion.

"Um, your highness, some of these copies read 'pebbles'."

"Everyone with a wand is to read what's on the sheet they're given! Got it?"

Kamek obediently nodded.
144211.title: The Victory Plan

choices: A Toad guard spots the march from the tower.
By the time the kingdom noticed, it was too late to act.
1442111.content:
The casters-Kamek, Wendy, the other Koopalings-held their wand aloft, and all chanted their assigned poems, with "petb-ls" starting it off. Their collective magic instruments shined with floating shapes. The reading soon finished, they all swung their wands toward Wendy's middle and her whole being shimmered with a rainbow glow. A deep rumbling in her gut alerted the crowd. Wendy giggled and placed one hand on her gut. The noise reached its peak and shook the soil.

Then the moment arrived. Everyone witnessed a swelling in Wendy's curvy front and her tail-dwarfing backside. Any grass below was smothered by her paunch. Her legs were pushed outward as they pumped up, busting apart their bubblegum heals . Up high, her two bracelets sank into extending bends of flab-wrapped vigour. From all this, a determined face with slowly filling cheeks reached higher storey levels.

And all onlookers stepped back as their lone lady superior looked more dome-like with every passing moment. Questions and fears filled their minds. Even her equals and superior were worried about what would become of her.

Within the minute it started, the rumbling and event halted. The girl now rivaled her stone-brick home in her height and area. She once more took in what she had become. As she faced the fields ahead, her arms were readied as she gave her foot a lift. With one step, her mass tilted slightly as it carried forward. After a few more steps, the plan was underway.

"Alright, Koopas!" Wendy pointed ahead. "Let's get those guys!"

The crowd cheered, and followed behind their enormous leader. They all had trouble walking with the tremors but were undeterred. Airships flew in and joined in the march. The Mushroom Kingdom's doom was surely at hand!
1442111.title: A Tank of a Koopa

choices: Quickly sneak away, grab a sleeping potion and use it on the boys.
Quickly sneak away, grab some mushrooms and sneak it into her oatmeal.
Quickly sneak away and take Kamek's wand.
145.content:
an addition by: RegularRexman



Boing, STOMP, boing, STOMP, boing, STOMP...

Most of her life, she's had feet stomped on her. She's always been fighting off one of those blue overalled mustache men and-just recently-a couple of Toads that actually have nerves. Her dreams don't give much assurance, either, as she curled up under her sheets. Dreams of fireballs toasting her, bombs she planted herself roasting her, and an odd vision where Peach tried to clonk her too, haunted her head for many nights. She can't get any rest, even just now as Roy bounces on the end of her bed before breakfast.

"C'mon, make us some breakfast for once! I made it the last five times!" He continued yelping and whining. "Get up and make it-MAKE IT-MAKE IT!!!"

All around the room were small boxes, containing all sorts of coins and jewels. Some were on top of the red dresser full of jeans and t-shirts she rarely wears. Some were piled under the posters for truck rallies and Ackman. One rested on her windowsill. All of them jingled as Roy's stomping continued.

Irritated and tired, Wendy couldn't handle any more of Roy's complaining. She sat up and shrieked an uptight "NO! GO AWAY!".

Roy jumped off the bed and shook the ground below him all around the castle. "C'mon, GET UP! GETUP-GETUP-GETUP-GETUP-GETUP-GETUP!!"

Morton's voice pipes in from behind the bedroom door. "Are you getting her up?"

"Yeah, yeah, I'm getting her up!"

"HEY SIS! GET UP, SLEEPY HEAD!" Morton then causes the castle to quake from outside Wendy's room. Roy joins in to what he first started.

They both chimed "GET!!" with each jump and "UP!!" with each stomp. This continued, keeping Wendy awake despite her tired eyes. After their some-teenth "GET!", Lemmy crashes through her window-tipping over the box resting on the windowsill-with his ball following shortly behind. He lands on the floor while his colourful ball bounces around the room and thwaps her in the head. Before Roy and Morton could stomp one more time, they're

interrupted by "ALLLLRRRRRRIIIIIIIGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHT! IIIII'LLLLLLLLLLL MAAAAAAAKE YOOOOOUUUUUUR FRRRRRRIIIIIGGGGGGGGIN' BREEEEEEEEEAKFAAAAAST!!" She then leaves the room, thwapping Morton down to the ground and heading downstairs.

****

All of the male Koopalings sat down at their seats at the dining table. Ludwig was jotting notes on a sheet of paper, detailing another deadly airship for taking on the Mario brothers Mario the Mario Brothers. Lemmy was still unconscious from his stunt-performing accident. Roy rubbed his ears, trying to get rid of the ringing. Iggy played with his fork, imagining it as a giant grater for Mario's demise. Morton rubbed his nose from the earlier bonking. And Larry sat there, tapping his fingers impatiently for food.

Meanwhile, in the kitchen next door, Wendy was preparing the spicy sugar oatmeal for the family with red, veiny eyes. She wanted nothing more than to get a "good night's sleep", whatever that was, but nothing made that possible. Her brothers annoyed her, and Mario haunted her dreams. She continued to swirl the oatmeal heated by caged Podoboos, staring into the warm, gooey mess and letting her mind ponder. What could I do about my predicament? How could I get my way all the time? She stopped stirring for a moment and shifted her eyes away. What does Kamek keep in his cabinet?

So what should Wendy do? Should she...
145.title: somthing else

1452.content:
Wendy sneaked over to Kamek's cabinet an finds some mushrooms.

"With these mushroom, I could stop the Mario Brothers myself!" Wendy said to her self. So she choped the mushrooms and placed it in her oatmeal.

Then, Larry shouted, " Where is our breakfast?" Then the male Koopalings started to chant,
"Breakfast!"
"Breakfast!"
"Breakfast!"

Wendy then started to pass out each Koopaling's oatmeal, saying, "There's your breakfast, now SHUT YOUR TRAP AND EAT!"

All the Koopalings did as Wendy said, reminded of this morning's inccident. Wendy made sure that she got the oatmeal with the mushrooms in it.

(Not to drive away from the story, but, where was Bowser at the time?)

Little did Wendy know, those mushrooms were not the kind Mario and friends use...

After breakfast, the Koopalings went to do their chores. Wendy did her chores as fast as she could, which is not very fast, due to her lack of sleep. After she finished her chores, she tried to get a little sleep.

After about 5 minutes of her haunting dreams, Wendy couldn't get any sleep. So she went on with her everyday activies.

---------------------------------------

As it reached bedtime for the Koopalings, they all got ready fot bed. Wendy put on a night gown made from a silky frabic covered in koopa scales (painted, of course) and got in bed. She actualy got some sleep that night. But when she awoke, she found out that she has gained...
1452.title: The Mushrooms...

14521.content:
Wendy raised her torso from her mattress, and stretched her arms while releasing a quiet yawn. Her sleep was foreign, for it contained no dreams of any kind that she could recall. She jumped out of her bed toward the nearest dressing cabinet of two doors. As she approached it; she quickly rubbed one eye and, in turn, rid herself of looking the least bit tired. She opened the doors of the cabinet, revealing a mirror tall enough for her, clothes galore and a pink and polka-dotted ribbon on the inside of the right hand door. She took off her night gown, straightened it out, and swapped it with the ribbon. She put her ribbon behind her head and used both hands to tie her bow with a smile and a tune in her hum.

She glanced at her reflection to see if her bow was on right; before finishing the knot, she quickly glanced back at her reflection with a
slightly troubled brow. She tightened her bow and held her pose.

She slowly brought both arms down, with her right hand coming close to her centre.
Her eyes dropped their glance to her belly's reflection. It looked a little bigger than usual. She placed the hand on her koopa shell belly, rubbing its surface on one small place.

The spot felt a little softer than Little Miss Koopaling remembered her shell had been before this day. This widened her eyes a little. Then she rubbed some more of her belly, which felt softer as well. She rubbed a slightly larger spot-soft as well. All of her belly was rubbed, and it was all a little softer than a koopa's shell would be.

Wendy looked back up at her reflection's face. She thought back to yesterday morning and the mushrooms. Her eyebrows raised as high as they could go. Soon, a smile appeared on her lips.

This must be the mushrooms working, she thought. Maybe they have a slow effect, but it's working...and my shell well be hard again later.

She brought her clenched hands close to her face and bent her knees down like springs.

"Eeeeee-"

Just then, the bedroom door creaked opened with Roy peering in.

Wendy turns to him with a loud "DON'T YOU EVER KNOCK!!!"

This startled the big bonehead back, still holding the door knob and pulling the door closed. Sounds from the other side seem like Roy bumping into Morton and two large thuds.

****

At breakfast time, all of the Koopalings were eating from their bowls of the Cheep-Cheep stew prepared for them; except Iggy and Lemmy, who juggling eachother's soup from with their bowls.Wendy finished her soup and left her bowl in front of her. She lowered her eyes and eyelids and widened her mouth with a smile; as she rubbed her small hill-shaped stomach, slightly moving its position on her body. Ludwig notices this and pauses his stew-eating. He turns his head directly to Wendy and raises his left eyebrow a centimetre. Wendy sees this, loses her smile, and turns her head away.

"Hmph" she scoffed.

From a separate part of the castle not presently visible, a roaring and dominating voice called out.

"YOUNG KOOPALINGS. IT IS TIME FOR A NEW PLAN."

Whatever was left of the stew in the Koopaling's bowls was quickly finished, as the seven siblings ran out of the dining room and into the hall, one-by-one. Ludwig was in the lead, followed in order by Morton, Roy, Iggy, Wendy, Lemmy and Larry

In the hall was a giant red door, which Ludwig knocked on to open it. Roy and Morton shoved him out of the way, and went through when the doors were separate enough to enter. Ludwig stood back up and cut in front of Lemmy.

In the door was a set of stairs which lead to many elevators and firebars leading down a round shaft of bricks. Morton, Lemmy, Larry and Ludwig retracted into their shells and spun past their other siblings down the obstacles; while Roy, Iggy and Wendy-with her subtle gut shaking in increments- jumped down behind
them.

At the bottom was a large green pipe, which they all jumped into in the order they went down. Soon enough, they all arrived in a giant chamber, where their father-the large and powerful Bowser-was waiting for them. They brought their attention to him.

"Alright kids. You're all here, so here's my plan."
14521.title: It's probably something.

145211.content:
"I am going to capture Peach again. However...we will take longer to prepare for Mario's 'rescue'."

The children were a little confused and looked at each other before turning back to their parent.

Bowser continued. "Yes. It will take weeks instead of days before the day we strike. We have made the defences against him too light. We must make it more than a chore for him. The ships shall be more armed, the castles will be taller, and the fields covered in spinies."

Ludwig steps forward. "So we all guard castles as usual."

"Yes, but we shall wear him down more. You will all be in pairs to do the job."

The children were in awe at this plan.

Ludwig asks, "So who's with Junior?"

"Huh?"

"There's seven of us. Who's with Junior, and where is he?"

"Oh, he's lifting weights in his room to prepare. And I guess, umm...Wendy is gonna share an Airship with Junior."

The brothers look at Wendy in surprise. Most of them turn in jealousy, except for the confused Ludwig and Iggy. Wendy is pleasantly surprised at this announcement, believing that by taking Mario down by herself, she would earn the highest regard from her Daddy. They look back at their father in attention.

As their father continues, Ludwig hears a faint, foreign sound coming from Wendy's shell. Tiny gurgles bubbling build up into a chorus inside of her, then distort into short "bwas" followed by crackling pops. He stares in confusion as the sound continues.

Wendy, however, is oblivious to these sounds, and notices Ludwig staring at her stomach. She responds with a confused and disgusted look, and a kick to his cheek.
145211.title: Her chance to shine!

choices: Junior, Wendy, and the Magikoopa talk on the ship.
1452112.content:
Eight days had passed after Bowser's big announcement. Many ships of differing forms are being prepared in Desert Land for the takeover of the Mushroom Kingdom. None of them were even close to completed; but Lakitus carried supplies in their clouds, and Hammer Bros. brought the planks and machines together.

Overseeing the operation was a Magikoopa holding stacked ship blueprints in his hands, standing feet away from a cliff to see the operation. Behind him was a arching black doorway with a copy of Bowser's face at the top. A red-lighted portal appears in the arch, with a smiling Bowser Jr. coming out of it. Junior approaches the blue-robed magician. The red portal vanishes

"Hey bub," said Junior, slapping the overseer hard on the back. "How are the ships coming?"

The Magikoopa looked to Junior. "Well, sir-ahem-only one cannon blew up, but so far, everything else has been all right."

Junior smiled wider. "That's great! Papa will love to hear that!"

"So is your sister coming here? I need to confirm where in which ship that you two are staying."

"Hm-hm," Junior laughed. "I'll get her."

He walked back towards the doorway. He quickly knocked on the side three times, causing the arch to create a light-purple portal. He poked his head in through the portal.

"Hey Sis," he said, snickering. "Come here. We have a question for you.”

He quickly turned to and walked back to Magikoopa. He turned back to the door, and they both waited for Wendy's arrival, with Junior trying to control his chuckling and Magikoopa looking at Junior before returning his sight to the door.

After being active for seconds, the portal revealed a small vertical hill of a orange hue-with a light peach cap of four horizontal segments-coming towards them. The visual surprises Magikoopa, now kn. The mass showed more of its lumpy soccer ball-size and revealed it self to be attached to a plump-legged, long armed, , Miss Wendy O Koopa; standing at twice Super Mario's height and with a shell at double its size, while holding a quarter slice of a ham sandwich with tiny bites taken out of it.

Junior calmed himself down and crossed his arms as he faces her.

“Ahem. So Sis,” he said to her. “How did Bertha make you angry? PFFFFT! HAHAHAHA!”

His crossed arms held his stomach as he laughed uncontrollably.

“Oh,” Wendy insincerely exclaimed, rolling her eyes. “What a funny joke.”

She looked towards the two and walked to them while her gut shakes.

“What do you want?”

The magikoopa says “Well, uh, I want to be sure that you two are on the same ship and have your stations picked,” and held out the blue prints.

Wendy looked over the prints as Magikoopa switched between them. Junior stopped laughing and stood up to walk over to the prints. Soon, a print of a long ship loaded with rotating cannons showed up. Wendy pointed to the center, where a large room with some Bob-omb cannons are placed.

“There.”

Junior was annoyed. “What?”

He quickly grabbed the blueprints from Magikoopa's hands and flipped through them. He stopped on a large, rounded ship loaded with Bullet Bill cannons, with many tiny rooms and spaces. He pointed to the only tall room, located at the back.

“This one!”

“WHAT!” Wendy shrieked at Junior. “I want the long one, and I want the big room!”

“I want the tall room in the the big round ship!”

“LONG!”

“TALL!”

“LONG!”

“TALL!”

****

It took an extra day, but the large rounded ship became the tip of the long ship.
1452112.title: The Co-Pilot in Pink

choices: She tries using the wand again.
1453.content:
That was when the idea hit her, if she wanted to solve her problem then maybe Kamek's wand could help matters.

She looked all over the room for the wand and was able to find it in a drawer.

She didn't know how to use it, but she just waved it around the room until it finally began to glow blue.

Her belly began to grow a bit, covering her inflating thighs by a couple centimeters. Her feet began to fatten up as well, making her heels a little tight to wear.

Her breasts slowly began to form on her chest and Wendy smiled at witnessing this transformation.

But before she could grow any further, the spell stopped.

"What a load."

She put the wand back in the drawer and began to examine her body.

"This is really good."

She used her claw to rub her belly, it felt really good to her.

"So know what should I do? This is so great, but how can I keep this under wraps?"
1453.title: Quickly sneak away and take Kamek's wand.

15.content: How about some of these ladies?
15.title: More

154.content: Ah, the ever faithful secretary of Count Black, what will happen that will cause this blue skinned gal to grow?
154.title: Nastasia

choices: One of the girls from the Wario ware game?
155.title: more choices

1552.content: OK, so who will it be?
1552.title: One of the girls from the Wario ware game?

15521.content: how's the cute black-haired witch gonna get fat?
15521.title: Ashley

155211.content: Ashley got bored one day and went to go ingredient shopping. But she had a slight problem, she had no money. How was she gonna remedy the situation? get a job. She had gone to Mushroom kingdom to work at the new Bakery of Princess Peach (as that was the only job she could find with decent pay). She was against it at first because she wasn't one to eat sweets, but she was willing to stomach anything to get money. Little did she know that her job would have a bigger impact on her than she thought. She walked into the shop to find Princess Peach...
155211.title: eating

15523.content: You can chose Kay and/or and or penny
15523.title: Kat and/or Ana Or penny

info.brief_description: The girls from the Mario games start packing on the pounds
info.description:
The girls form Mario start to gain and get fat. So pick a girl you like and fatten her up. Will Peach be fattened by Bowser as part of a plan to stop Mario from saving her? Will Daisy stuff herself with fatty foods? Will Wendy Koopa become the biggest Koopa around? The choices are up to you.

But first here are some rules:


Make the chapter’s coherent, that is to say, make sure to at lest make a decent attempt typing the chapters up with correct grammar, spelling and the such, it doesn’t have to be perfect but at lest put a little effort in when writing them.

Try to make the chapters long, at lest one paragraph minimum.

No slob stuff, no farting, slobber are any of that stuff, let’s try to keep this clean.

They can get as fat and big as you want, but try to keep things practical, no “gains 1000000000 pounds in the one chapter” stuff

No Gay/ Lesbian stuff allowed

Allow to be other choices. Don’t just have the one selection in the chapters as other people may want to go another way with the story


keep it PG 13
